languages.text: Синюшная кожа мертвеца покрыта инеем. Никто не удосужился убрать тело — слишком обыденными стали смерти в капелле.
The corpse's blueish skin is coated with frost — no one has bothered to remove the body. Death has become too mundane an occurrence at the chapel.
languages.original_text: Синюшная кожа мертвеца покрыта инеем. Никто не удосужился убрать тело — слишком обыденными стали смерти в капелле.

traits.locale_text: The corpse's blueish skin is coated with frost. No one has bothered to remove the body — death has become too mundane an occurrence at the chapel.

The corpse's blueish skin is coated with frost — no one has bothered to remove the body. Death has become too mundane an occurrence at the chapel.

languages.text: Die bläuliche Haut des Leichnams ist mit Frost bedeckt ... niemand hat sich die Mühe gemacht, ihn zu entfernen. Der Tod ist in der Kapelle zu einem alltäglichen Gast geworden.
languages.original_text: The corpse's blueish skin is coated with frost — no one has bothered to remove the body. Death has become too mundane an occurrence at the chapel.

traits.locale_text: Die bläuliche Haut des Leichnams ist mit Frost bedeckt ... niemand hat sich die Mühe gemacht, ihn zu entfernen. Der Tod ist in der Kapelle zu einem alltäglichen Gast geworden.

languages.text: La peau bleuâtre du cadavre est recouverte d'une pellicule de givre. Personne ne s'est donné la peine d'enlever le corps. La mort est devenue par trop commune dans la chapelle.
languages.original_text: The corpse's blueish skin is coated with frost — no one has bothered to remove the body. Death has become too mundane an occurrence at the chapel.

traits.locale_text: La peau bleuâtre du cadavre est recouverte d'une pellicule de givre. Personne ne s'est donné la peine d'enlever le corps. La mort est devenue par trop commune dans la chapelle.

languages.text: La piel azulada del cadáver está cubierta de escarcha. Nadie ha retirado el cuerpo. La muerte es algo demasiado cotidiano en la capilla.
languages.original_text: The corpse's blueish skin is coated with frost — no one has bothered to remove the body. Death has become too mundane an occurrence at the chapel.

traits.locale_text: La piel azulada del cadáver está cubierta de escarcha. Nadie ha retirado el cuerpo. La muerte es algo demasiado cotidiano en la capilla.

languages.text: 死体の青味がかった肌には霜が降りていた。礼拝堂では、死はあまりにもありふれた出来事になってしまっている。
languages.original_text: The corpse's blueish skin is coated with frost — no one has bothered to remove the body. Death has become too mundane an occurrence at the chapel.

traits.locale_text: 死体の青味がかった肌には霜が降りていた。礼拝堂では、死はあまりにもありふれた出来事になってしまっている。

languages.text: 尸体淡蓝色的皮肤上覆着一层霜。根本没人去费心把尸体搬走。在这座小教堂里，死亡早已成了司空见惯的景象。
languages.original_text: The corpse's blueish skin is coated with frost — no one has bothered to remove the body. Death has become too mundane an occurrence at the chapel.

traits.locale_text: 尸体淡蓝色的皮肤上覆着一层霜。根本没人去费心把尸体搬走。在这座小教堂里，死亡早已成了司空见惯的景象。

languages.text: Cesedin maviye çalan derisi buzla kaplanmış. Cesedi kaldırmakla kimse uğraşmamış. Ölüm, şapelde alelade bir hadise hâlini almış.
languages.original_text: The corpse's blueish skin is coated with frost — no one has bothered to remove the body. Death has become too mundane an occurrence at the chapel.
